text:
CURRICULAM VITEA
MOHAMMAD KHURSHID ALAM 
    Mobile. 0091-9546465053
    SKYPE – 0525063893.
    Email- alamkhurshid1972@gmail.com 
                                                                                    
                                                                            
 
SUMMARY:-
           Remarkable gifted and skillful Electronics, Electric and Security system 
technique with more than ten years’ experience in extensive knowledge of both 
legacy and current system. Sincerely enjoy providing high quality service to 
clients.
Excellent working relations with co-workers .Can are trusted to handle complaints 
diplomatically. Prepare as built drawing for new hook up and report to computers
And electronic system. Guide to instrument technician on their day to day jobs and 
in diagnosing faults.
EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS:-
•
Inter Science (Biology) - 1992.
•
Diploma in Electronic & Telecommunication Engineering, Bihar- 1997  
(Three Years).
•
Apprentice Course in Electric from Ranjan Chemicals Ltd.,       
Barauni Bihar- 06th June 1998 to 07th June 1999. 
SHORT TURM COURSE CERTIFICATE :- 
            .   Electrical Safety Rules   
            .   First Aider 
            .   Fire Warden & Risk Assessment (from Oman and UAE)

            .   HSE Training
            
SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATION:-
. Responsible for providing quality technical services by diagnosing, services 
and repairing a variety of  low voltage system such as an audio and video system, 
all types of ride pneumatic system, multimax access controls, IP and analog 
CCTV  and intrusion alarm system, Paging system , public Address systems, 
UV/IR flame & Fully Addressable Fire alarm systems (Honeywell brand, Gent 
34000, Autronica- BS100, BS 60. Autrosafe, Simplex) and maintenance of 
F&G,ESD, fire pump controller, Deluge Valve ,Fire Suppression systems 
( Powder, water, Foam Gaseous & Clean agent ), BMS,UPS and other electronic 
control system at complex. Automatic Sliding doors (Dorma & Besam). Diagnose 
equipment problems through different troubleshooting techniques, repair and 
replace defective devices, parts and test to ensure the proper working condition. 
Supervise installation of various BMS devices such as microprocessor based 
digital controls, sensor and actuators. For the monitoring of all building 
mechanical and electrical services which includes air conditioning and Electrical 
power distribution lighting, PLC based controller & other system.
. Responsible for the roughing-in/wiring installation, troubleshooting ,Testing and
commissioning of equipment and devices for various auxiliary system such as 
Network, Panasonic & AD CCTV, MATV, Burglar Alarm, Video Intercom, 
PA/BGM and Vehicular Traffic Control System.
